entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
